# CRM System Documentation for Future Claude Interactions

## Overview
North Star Group uses a custom MariaDB-based CRM system in the "modular" database. This document provides complete context for future conversations about CRM operations, data updates, and business tracking.

## Database Structure

### Core Tables

**deals** - Primary opportunity tracking
- `id` (PK, auto-increment)
- `title`, `description` 
- `deal_type_id` (FK to deal_types)
- `stage_id` (FK to deal_stages)
- `company_id` (FK to companies)
- `value` (DECIMAL 15,2), `currency`, `probability`
- `expected_close_date`, `actual_close_date`
- `created_by`, `assigned_to` (FK to users)
- `created_at`, `updated_at`

**companies** - Customer/vendor/partner records
- `company_id` (PK, auto-increment)
- `name`, `website`, `email`, `phone`
- `address`, `city`, `state`, `postal_code`, `country`
- `industry`, `description`
- `field_group` (enum: General, Vendor, Customer, Contractor, Specific)
- `company_details`, `is_active`, `user_id`
- `created_at`, `updated_at`

**deal_stages** - Pipeline stages with display order and colors
- Standard stages: New(25), Started(26), Processing(27), Close(28), Hold(29), Won(30), Lost(31)

**deal_types** - Business line categorization
- Current types: Housing(47), Grants(48), Broadband(49), Church Refuge(50), Manufacturing(51), Artificial Intelligence(52), Rain Garden(53), Intellectual Property(54), FairTrace(55), PHA Housing(56), Convertible Pew(57)

**deal_activities** - Task and interaction tracking
- `activity_type` (UPPERCASE): MEETING, EMAIL, MILESTONE, RESEARCH, CALL, SETUP, TRAINING, FIELDWORK, DOCUMENTATION
- `subject`, `description`, `due_date`
- `completed` (boolean), `completed_at`
- `created_by`, `assigned_to`

**deal_notes** - Conversation and update records
- Free-form content with creator and timestamps

**deal_contacts** - Many-to-man
